extent.charseq: the passenger shot Bolton multiple times
the passenger shot Bolton multiple times

ldc_extent.charseq: Officer Sean Bolton saw an illegally parked car on the streets of Memphis, pulled up in front of it and shone his spotlight.
"Officer Bolton apparently interrupted some sort of drug transaction," Memphis Police Director Toney Armstrong said.
Suspect named Memphis police identified Tremaine Wilbourn, 29, as the suspect.
Emergency crews took him to a hospital in critical condition, where he was later pronounced dead.
"You gunned down, you murdered a police officer, for less than 2 grams of marijuana," he said.

"For a police officer to have that kind of temperament, and to take such a cautious approach to the use of force, he was a credit to the uniform," his friend Steve Clements told The Commercial Appeal newspaper in Memphis.

"For a police officer to have that kind of temperament, and to take such a cautious approach to the use of force, he was a credit to the uniform," his friend Steve Clements told The Commercial Appeal newspaper in Memphis.

"For a police officer to have that kind of temperament, and to take such a cautious approach to the use of force, he was a credit to the uniform," his friend Steve Clements told The Commercial Appeal newspaper in Memphis.
This is the third time a Memphis police officer has been killed in the past four years.
Driver turns himself in The vehicle's driver later turned himself in and was released without charge.

extent.charseq: A struggle ensued, and the passenger shot Bolton multiple times, authorities said.
the passenger shot Bolton multiple times
The car drove off, leaving the officer for dead.
The violence was senseless given how mundane the stop was, Armstrong said.
Emergency crews took him to a hospital in critical condition, where he was later pronounced dead.
"You gunned down, you murdered a police officer, for less than 2 grams of marijuana," he said.

"For a police officer to have that kind of temperament, and to take such a cautious approach to the use of force, he was a credit to the uniform," his friend Steve Clements told The Commercial Appeal newspaper in Memphis.
Fallen officers Bolton, 33, is one of 19 officers killed nationwide this year by violent suspects.
Fallen officers Bolton, 33, is one of 19 officers killed nationwide this year by violent suspects.

The deaths at the hands of suspects run the gamut -- veterans and rookie officers -- and span the nation -- from Georgia to California "Last night, we lost not only an officer, but a great man, a dedicated servant to our community and a family member," Armstrong said.
This is the third time a Memphis police officer has been killed in the past four years.
Driver turns himself in The vehicle's driver later turned himself in and was released without charge.
Driver turns himself in The vehicle's driver later turned himself in and was released without charge.
Authorities are offering a $10,000 reward for information leading to Wilbourn's arrest.
He is out on supervised release for a 121-month sentence for robbery, according to Armstrong.
